description:
My place is close to Astoria, the nicest neighborhood in queens!. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.

Guests have access to the whole apartment, located on the first floor (above lobby).

Many shops, restaurants, bars and supermarkets within walking distance. Subway stations close by as well.

Many restaurants, shops, supermarkets are within walking distance. Subway is approximately 10-15min pleasant walk through a very safe residential neighborhood. Buses 1 block away.
name: Cozy 1BD Apt 20min from Manhattan!
